title: Tookan
description:
Tookan is an off-the-shelf solution to manage and track, field workforces that enable on-demand deliveries, at-home services and on-street customer acquisition. Businesses will need to create an account on TookanApp.com to get started.
Using the Tookan App, fleet members will never have to call the manager again to get the delivery information or to provide their status.
